Class RoomWithGui

  • java.lang.Object
    • sim.display.GUIState
      • geomason.RoomWithGui

  • public class RoomWithGui
extends GUIState
    Author:
    Norman Langner This class draws the simulation in 2 frames, the simulation-frame and the control-frame. See Mason-manual for more informations
